chart_description: This chart displays the rate of errors generated by the Netdata DB engine. The chart provides insights on fs errors, io errors, and pg cache over half-dirty events and the sum of all three types of errors.

dimension_descriptions.fs_errors: The rate of errors reported by the filesystem.
dimension_descriptions.io_errors: The rate of I/O errors reported by the storage system.
dimension_descriptions.pg_cache_over_half_dirty_events: The rate of events when the percentage of dirtied pages in the Postgres cache crossed 50%.
